channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Android USB Driver windows installer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Android USB Driver windows installer

item.title: CVE-2022-28779|2024-08-03T06:03:52.653Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20android%20usb%20driver%20windows%20installer
item.description: Uncontrolled search path element vulnerability in Samsung Android USB Driver windows installer program prior to version 1.7.50 allows attacker to execute arbitrary code.
